text: @SAfmnews Where is #angiemotshekga and @DBE_SA  now, @HealthZA and @DrZweliMkhize will soon be overwhelmed with these #COVID19 cases. We need the @PresidencyZA to make a decision on this as the E Cape is already breathing through the wound in terms of service delivery  and  clean water.
